name: Medmonk
headline: A tool for pharmacists to find funding for patients who are unable toâ¦
description:
Medmonk is a technology platform that helps fight non-adherence. It enables pharmacists to provide financial assistance to patients who are unable to pay for their medications. We partner with pharmaceutical companies, pharmacies, physicians, and health plans to improve outcomes by promoting access to chronic therapy.

Medmonk is based on the premise that it's in everyone's best interest for medications to be used regardless of price. Patients get the care they need, insurers are protected against larger claims, and pharmaceutical companies and pharmacies get maximum use of their medications.

# Revolutionizing Patient Access to Vital Therapies
At Medmonk, we strongly believe that patients receiving their medication without unnecessary delays is a collective win. It's a win for the patient, a win for the healthcare provider, and a win for the pharmaceutical brand. Together, we enhance the process by which patients stay on track with their treatment, enabling them to focus on their health and well-being.
Watch Video
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FMedmonk-Network1.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Hub Services
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FSupport-Provided.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Automated eBV + ePA
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FBrand-Loyalty.png&w=3840&q=75)

![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FPatient-Approval.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Data Analytics
## Medmonk As Your Partner
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FMedmon-Partner1.png&w=3840&q=75)
### EXPERTISE IN RARE DISEASES
Medmonk specializes in managing therapies that treat rare diseases, bringing unparalleled expertise to the patient experience. Our team understands the unique challenges these conditions present, and we tailor our services to support each and every patient.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FMedmon-Partner2.png&w=3840&q=75)
### EXTENSIVE SPECIALTY PHARMACY NETWORK
Medmonk is connected and contracted with 98% of pharmacies, buy & bill facilities, and infusion centers nationwide. This extensive network ensures seamless collaboration and efficient solutions.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2FMedmon-Partner3.png&w=3840&q=75)
### EFFORTLESS INTEGRATION
Our platform seamlessly integrates with pharmacy and provider billing terminals. This simplifies the hub, copay, and patient assistance enrollment process, ensuring a smooth experience for all users in both medical and pharmacy benefits.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomization.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Customization
We tailor support programs for brands, addressing the individual needs of patients, healthcare providers, and pharmacies, with a focus on agility and customization in each unique landscape
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomization1.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Collaboration
Medmonk works in tandem with brand teams, harmonizing marketing, financial planning, and sales approaches to meet brand objectives and provide enhanced patient experience.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fspeed.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Speed
Medmonk's automated system enables instant patient enrollment into the hub, all within a remarkable timeframe of under three seconds.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomization.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Customization
We tailor support programs for brands, addressing the individual needs of patients, healthcare providers, and pharmacies, with a focus on agility and customization in each unique landscape
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fcustomization1.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Collaboration
Medmonk works in tandem with brand teams, harmonizing marketing, financial planning, and sales approaches to meet brand objectives and provide enhanced patient experience.
![](http://medmonk.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fspeed.png&w=3840&q=75)

## Partners
Medmonk is incubated by leading investors who share our vision of revolutionizing patient care. Their strategic guidance and deep industry insights empower us to drive innovation and expand our impact. Together, we are dedicated to enhancing access to life-saving medications and improving patient outcomes.
Institutional PartnersSpecialty Pharmacy Partners

## Success Stories
Previous
### Brand Manager - Expanding Access to Rare Disease Treatments
"Medmonk's patient financial support program has been instrumental in enhancing access to our rare disease medication directly at the point of care. This initiative has significantly improved our ability to reach patients quickly and efficiently, ensuring they receive the necessary treatments immediately. Thanks to Medmonk, we can support more patients and truly make a difference in their lives."
### Patient Success Story - Navigating Insurance with Ease
"When my life-saving medication was first prescribed, I was nervous and concerned about the approval and copay costs. They guided me through every step of the insurance process and helped me navigate the complexities. Thanks to their dedication."

generated_description:
### Medmonk: Revolutionizing Patient Access to Medications

**Overview**  
Medmonk is a cutting-edge technology platform based in Milpitas, CA, that tackles the critical issue of medication non-adherence. Its mission is clear: help pharmacists find funding solutions for patients who struggle to afford their medications. By partnering with various stakeholders—including pharmaceutical companies, pharmacies, and healthcare providers—Medmonk works to ensure that patients have access to the chronic therapies they need, regardless of their ability to pay.

**How It Works**  
Why is Medmonk’s approach so impactful? The underlying premise is simple yet powerful: when patients get the medications they need, everyone benefits. Patients receive essential care, insurers can avoid higher claims costs, and pharmaceutical companies and pharmacies see better medication utilization. This triad of positive outcomes makes a strong case for Medmonk’s innovative model.

**Services Offered**  
Medmonk offers a suite of solutions aimed at improving the patient's journey through the healthcare system:

- **Hub Services**: Streamlining support systems for patients.
- **Automated Enrollment**: Enabling quick patient enrollment in assistance programs.
- **Copay Assistance**: Helping patients manage upfront costs.
- **Patient Assistance Programs (PAP)**: Assisting patients who qualify for financial aid.
- **Non-Commercial Pharmacy Solutions**: Direct access to medications without commercial barriers.
- **Data Analytics**: Utilizing insights to optimize patient access strategies.

One of Medmonk's standout features is its expertise in rare disease therapies, where the team understands the unique challenges these patients face and tailors services accordingly.

**Network and Collaboration**  
With connections to around 98% of pharmacies and healthcare facilities nationwide, Medmonk ensures a seamless flow of resources and information. Their platform's integration capabilities simplify the enrollment processes significantly, aiming for patient enrollment in mere seconds—under three, to be exact.

**Success Stories**  
Testimonials from brand managers and patients alike highlight Medmonk's efficacy. From easing the path of rare disease treatments at the point of care to assisting patients in navigating insurance complexities, the stories emphasize the real-world impact Medmonk has on patient lives.

**Team and Background**  
Founded as part of Y Combinator's W12 batch, Medmonk operates with a lean team of just two employees, showcasing the potential of focused operations within a critical sector like healthcare.

**Conclusion**  
In an era where access to healthcare can often feel like a luxury, Medmonk stands out as a beacon of innovation. By prioritizing medication accessibility and patient support, they're not just improving outcomes—they're redefining how we think about healthcare accessibility. If you’re interested in joining their mission or learning more, you can visit their website at [Medmonk](http://medmonk.com).
